page.title: 07History: Gadshill Area
page.content: The area around Gadshill was mentioned by Shakespeare as being noted for highway robbery. This was a problem for a very long time. The main road still passes through the same places on its way from London to the coast, so it would have been a busy highway in coaching days. Pockets of new housing have sprung up in the areas of Gadshill and Shorne Ridgway since 1945. Village life is not considered to be what it was by at least some of the present residents of the area. There is no longer, they say, the same closely connected community life. There are many families living in the area who use the villages rather as dormitories, while they commute to London, Gravesend or Rochester.
